topic: CLEC早季作物分类框架改进实验

evidence.query: crop mapping temporal prediction Transformer Mamba state space model
evidence.title: AgriFM: A Multi-source Temporal Remote Sensing Foundation Model for Crop Mapping
evidence.note: 多源时序遥感基础模型用于作物制图，可作为预测模块替换的参考架构和baseline对比对象

evidence.title: TABS-Net: A Temporal Spectral Attentive Block with Space-Time Fusion Network for Robust Cross-Year Crop Mapping
evidence.note: 提出时间-光谱注意力块处理跨年物候偏移问题，其temporal attention设计可借鉴用于改进预测模块对周期性模式的捕获

evidence.query: early season crop classification time series
evidence.title: Early-Season Crop Classification Based on Local Window Attention Transformer with Time-Series RCM and Sentinel-1
evidence.note: 使用Local Window Attention Transformer做早季SAR时序分类，12篇引用，可作为Transformer-based分类baseline

evidence.title: Quantum-Optimized Selective State Space Model for Efficient Time Series Prediction
evidence.note: 对比了Autoformer、Informer和S-Mamba在长序列预测上的表现，指出SSM在线性复杂度下可匹配Transformer，为预测模块替换提供架构选型依据

evidence.query: multi-task learning loss balancing uncertainty weighting
evidence.title: Analytical Uncertainty-Based Loss Weighting in Multi-Task Learning
evidence.note: 提出解析最优的uncertainty-based权重，比GradNorm更高效，10篇引用。可直接作为GradNorm的替代方案

evidence.title: Improvable Gap Balancing for Multi-Task Learning
evidence.note: 提出基于损失的Improvable Gap Balancing，比梯度方法更高效，9篇引用（UAI 2023）。明确指出loss balancing比gradient balancing更高效

evidence.title: DeepChest: Dynamic Gradient-Free Task Weighting for Effective Multi-Task Learning
evidence.note: 提出无梯度的动态任务权重方法，计算效率高，可作为GradNorm替代方案的候选

evidence.query: early season crop classification soybean maize
evidence.title: Enhancing early-season soybean identification through optical and SAR time-series integration
evidence.note: 针对大豆-玉米光谱高度相似的早季识别挑战，使用光学+SAR融合，可作为鲁棒性实验的baseline参考

evidence.query: early season crop classification deep learning
evidence.title: Early-Season Crop Classification Utilizing Time Series Based Deep Learning with Multi-Sensor Remote Sensing Data
evidence.note: 多传感器时序深度学习做早季分类，提供了数据增强和多源融合的实践参考
